welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hesperia, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our beautiful town and enjoy all that it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Molly Brown's Country Cafe
restaurants.description: Molly Brown's Country Cafe is a breakfast spot located in Hesperia.
restaurants.address: 16575 Smoketree St (at Hesperia Rd), Hesperia, CA 92345

restaurants.name: Philly Steak & Subs
restaurants.description: Philly Steak & Subs is a deli located in Hesperia.
restaurants.address: 15776 Main St (Between 8th and 9th Avenues), Hesperia, CA 92345

restaurants.name: The Italian Kitchen
restaurants.description: The Italian Kitchen is a italian restaurant located in Hesperia.

restaurants.name: Olympic Flame Burgers
restaurants.description: Olympic Flame Burgers is a burger joint located in Hesperia.

restaurants.name: Go Bangkok Thai Cuisine
restaurants.description: Go Bangkok Thai Cuisine is a thai restaurant located in Hesperia.
restaurants.address: 15800 Main St Ste 200 (8th Avenue), Hesperia, CA 92345

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southern California Logistics Airport serves both commercial and cargo flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Southern California Logistics Airport is used for handling and storage of cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The primary terminal for all commercial flights at Apple Valley Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at Apple Valley Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norton AFB Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Norton AFB Airport handles freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is home to several major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is equipped with customs and immigration facilities.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the ONT Free WiFi network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for charter and private flights at Cable Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
